text: Is there a summary somewhere of existing users or volume of existing use of Fabric? e.g. Fabric applications have processed X transactions in the last month for these clients?
<@U2P14DVMG> Usually people publish or announce it - but I am not aware of a central repo for this info.
Personally, as a maintainer of fabric, one sees a lot - so I can only assess from the data points I have… but there were a few big announcements from key member companies here.
Yup. Sorry. Nothing “official” and since people download it and deploy locally, we have no real way to know.
Some players (especially financial institutions are very protective of this info actually). Many (of us) often also sign some NDAs reagarding deployments.
ok. I’m trying to build a case for relevance of the platform; some competing platforms are a lot more public about usage.
I can try to find some relevant stuff actually.
